note.p: Electrical engineer. Son of John George Fenwick’s sister Lucy Watson (1838–1918). Technical manager, electrical supply company, Monkseaton, Northumberland, 1911.
BMD (Birth index, Death index, Marriage index)
Census returns of England and Wales 1891 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG12/4176/67/59), 1911 (RG14/30804)
Institution of Electrical Engineers membership list 1930
